tag_list: microsoft--net, agile, domain-driven, motivator, agent-of-change, hands-on-technologist
overview:
Mr. Carr is a highly accomplished thought leader working ‘trenches up’ in software.

He has served as the CTO of a multinational commercial software company.

More specifically, Mr. Carr is focused on advanced Microsoft.NET 3.5 implementations using Silverlight 2.0 and Object to Relational (ORM) framework technology, especially NHibernate. Agile software development processes are also his focus for over a decade.
